titles.title: We See The Lord, And He Is High Upon His Throne

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We see the Lord, and He is high upon His throne,
And His glory fills the heavens and the earth.
One like the Lamb who was slain is on the throne,
And we cast our crowns before Him and bow down to pray.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Everything cries holy, (3x.)
To You, Lord. (2x.)
